short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Protect your sensitive data when recording or screen sharing. The browser extension to enhance your online privacy and security.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🛡️ DataBlur: Your Free & Secure Data Protection Shield 🛡️

Safeguard your sensitive information with DataBlur, the 100% free Chrome extension designed to enhance your online privacy and security. Whether you're sharing your screen, recording videos, or simply browsing the web, DataBlur keeps your confidential data hidden, masked, and protected from prying eyes. 🕵️‍♂️🔒

Key Features:
✅ Completely Free: All features available at no cost - no premium version, no hidden fees 🆓
✅ 100% Safe: All data processing happens locally on your device - nothing is sent to servers 🔐
✅ One-Click Protection: Instantly blur, hide, or mask any element with a single click 🖱️
✅ Customizable Masking: Adjust blur intensity or use blackout for maximum security 🎛️
✅ Area Blur: Draw rectangles to blur specific regions on the page 🖌️
✅ Persistent Protection: 'Keep Blur' function maintains your settings even after page reload 🔄

Coming soon:
🔜 Smart Data Detection: Automatically identify and scramble sensitive information 🧠
🔜 Text Scrambling: Replace sensitive text with random characters for added security 🔡
🔜 Screenshot Security: Capture privacy-protected screenshots directly from the extension 📸

Perfect for:
• 👔 Professionals safeguarding client information
• 👩‍🏫 Educators protecting student data during online classes
• 🎥 Content creators ensuring privacy during live streams
• 💼 Remote workers securing sensitive company data
• 🏠 Individuals masking personal information while browsing

How It Works:

1. Enable DataBlur with one click 🖱️
2. Select elements to blur, hide, or mask, or use smart auto-detection 🔍
3. Customize protection settings for your needs ⚙️
4. Browse, present, or record with complete peace of mind 😎

Why Choose DataBlur:
• 🤓 User-friendly interface for effortless privacy protection
• 🔄 Seamless integration with Chrome for a smooth browsing experience
• 🚀 Regular updates to stay ahead of evolving privacy threats
• 🆓 Completely free - no premium version, all features included
• 🛡️ 100% safe - all data stays on your device, ensuring maximum privacy
• 🖼️ Built-in screenshot editor for final touches
• 📱 Works across various platforms and screen-sharing tools

Don't compromise on privacy. Download DataBlur now and take control of your online security - for free! Blur, hide, and mask your sensitive information with ease, knowing that all data processing happens securely on your own device. Browse smarter, share safer, and keep your data truly private. 🔐🌟

Try DataBlur today and experience the ultimate in free, secure web privacy protection! 🚀🛡️
